hints.mnemonic: The world's most prolific drug dealer maintains a massive grove of hemp in a cave to avoid law enforcement.

hints.author: harusame
hints.mnemonic: Hemp is an extremely useful material and can be used to make produce healthy oils (such as omega-3 and 6), fibers for clothing, biomass for fuel and even sturdy industrial matierals. (All of this is true.) Unfortunately, because the USDEA is run by a bunch of morons that refuse to distinguish between it and marijuana, you can't get a permit to grow it and thus have to grow your hemp groves in a cave to avoid fines and prosecution.

hints.author: osaki
hints.mnemonic: The hemp grove is in the cave.

hints.author: ashman63
hints.mnemonic: If you grind the hemp you are bound to get stoned quicker.

hints.author: Nukemarine
hints.mnemonic: You must GRIND the HEMP collected in the grove by your cave on solid STONE to make the best ropes.

hints.author: CSBarnes
hints.mnemonic: "Grind, grind, grind the hemp, slowly with the stone".

hints.author: BStoobs
hints.mnemonic: Ma (マ) used to grind hemp with a stone and then brush her teeth with it to relieve the pain when she got toothache.

hints.author: mcmike2099
hints.mnemonic: Grind your HEMP on a STONE to prepare the marijuana that will get you stoned.

hints.author: munia
hints.mnemonic: (mature content

hints.author: oRis1024
hints.mnemonic: Heart needs three drops of blood to work.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Pictograph, see book.

hints.author: narafan
hints.mnemonic: こころ！.

hints.author: radical_tyro
hints.mnemonic: When this primitive is on the left as state of mind, I had a hard time visualizing it. Thus I have created the following story. All the smartest people in the country were fed up with their state governments. These great minds joined together and created their own official state

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: You only truly forget her when she has perished in your heart.

hints.author: alantin
hints.mnemonic: To forget means that something perishes from your heart.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Perish my heart if I forget this kanji.

hints.author: penot
hints.mnemonic: A dead heart is the only way to forget your love.

hints.author: zer0range
hints.mnemonic: We keep the deceased in our hearts so as not to forget.

hints.author: CasualTatsumaki
hints.mnemonic: Selfish lover breaks your heart and moves on to the next lover. (And yawns with a heart of ice at your suffering).

hints.author: terozen
hints.mnemonic: A selfish person doesn't care about the next person's heart, only their own.

hints.author: Hinode
hints.mnemonic: I'm born with two hearts? How lucky! Well I could donate one and save the life of someone else, but I'm one selfish bastard.... If my first one fails, I'll just move on to my next heart!

hints.author: gfb345
hints.mnemonic: His son is a spoiled, SELF-INDULGENT prima-donna, going from one venture to the NEXT (at daddy's expense, of course), whatever takes over his HEART at the moment. (Cf. wish (#1590 念)).

hints.author: FooSoft
hints.mnemonic: When I have trouble concentrating, it's like my heart runs off to some next arbitrary activity, rather than staying focused on what I'm working on!

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: A ninja must be able to endure the pain of clinging to a ceiling, motionless, for hours at a time, waiting for just the right moment to drop down and thrust the blade of his sword into the hearts of his enemies. By the way, this character is used in the compound 忍者 (ninja) which is why I choose to use ninja as its primitive meaning.

hints.author: Kurisu
hints.mnemonic: 忍び （しのび）Shinobi the 忍者 （にんじゃ）Ninja was able to endure the massacre of his family & horrors of his training by placing the way of the blade above the way of the heart.

hints.author: Tzadeck
hints.mnemonic: To endure unrequited love is like living with a blade in your heart.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Someone with a razor blade stuck in their heart has to endure the pain wherever they go and can tell no one about it.

hints.author: WeTsTICK
hints.mnemonic: I doubt you can endure a blade in your heart for very long.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: You are given a speech about some serious mistakes of yours, and you have to endure the whole thing, because all you can do is acknowledge.

hints.author: sweetneet
hints.mnemonic: I never read the "acknowledgements" section of books or theses, because they are mostly just boring words that i must endure reading, before i can get to the interesting part.

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: You would think that most ninjas (see previous frame) would acknowledge each other's presence with something like a silent nod. Imagine the consequences if, while raiding an enemy castle, one stupid ninja chose to acknowledge another by saying, "HELLO!!".

hints.author: ihatobu
hints.mnemonic: In Japan, people who make efforts to endure (gaman) can expect to receive words of acknowledgement at some point. The ability to endure is so valued and respected in Japan that acknowlegement of some sort is virtually inevitable.

hints.author: Medeo
hints.mnemonic: Some Oscar winners go on far too long with their acceptance speech. But we are expected to politely ENDURE their endless stream of WORDS as they acknowledge their colleagues and loved ones.

hints.author: Nukemarine
hints.mnemonic: Remember the tale of Cleopatra? She was MOURNING the loss of her Marc Antony, so she placed the asp SNAKE to her HEART.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: You are mourning the death of a relative, and it feels as if a snake had bitten into your heart. -- "mourning feels like snake-bitten heart".

hints.author: ihatobu
hints.mnemonic: Mourning is really self-pity. When someone mourns, it seems on the surface that they are feeling sadness for a lost loved one. In reality, they are feeling heavy-hearted because they themselves have permanently lost something very precious.

hints.author: Yozora
hints.mnemonic: Mourning can feel like a constrictor SNAKE is squeezing your HEART to death.

hints.author: Howdoken
hints.mnemonic: When Snake finally killed Sniper Wolf, his heart was filled with mourning.

hints.author: narafan
hints.mnemonic: A samurai's intentions always come from the heart.

hints.author: amthomas
hints.mnemonic: Gentleman always have hearts full of good intentions.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Tom Cruise no doubt had good intentions when he made the Last Samurai - his heart in the right place (right there, down to earth). Too bad the concept of a white dude as the last samurai is ridiculous, if not offensive. Picture Tom Cruise in a press conference being asked about this, at which point he jumps on a heart-shaped, grabs somebody's hands, and screams BUT MY INTENTIONS WERE FROM THE HEART! SCIENTOLOGY HELPS PEOPLE.

hints.author: wazato
hints.mnemonic: A samurai shows up at the door to pick up his date. Her father asks, "What are your intentions with my daughter?" He responds that his intentions come from the heart.

hints.author: nekoyaki
hints.mnemonic: Father

hints.author: indigo
hints.mnemonic: This is quite simple

hints.author: Johan
hints.mnemonic: A will is an important document that contains your final word on how you intend to distribute your assets.

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: A policeman stops you (in Japan) saying, "Documents, please". You

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: When you document your source code, you use English words to describe the intention of the highly technical program code.

hints.author: amthomas
hints.mnemonic: Words can document your intentions.

hints.author: mantixen
hints.mnemonic: Giving a girl flowers is like lighting the wick to her heart.

hints.author: ikmys
hints.mnemonic: My favorite are heart shaped candles that smell like sweet flowers. The trick is to find one with a thick wick, they give off the most flower scent (but burn the quickest).

hints.author: timcampbell
hints.mnemonic: My girlfriend jabbed a long-stemmed flower into my heart, then lit it like a wick. She had a funny way of saying "I love you".

hints.author: kapalama
hints.mnemonic: 替芯 , 鉛筆の芯 , 芯を切る , 芯が腐っている wick (#2368 芯) シン ... Parts

hints.author: Proxx
hints.mnemonic: Imagine a beautiful flower with a strange wick sticking out at the top. You ignite it - the flower turns into a heart!

hints.author: CharleyGarrett
hints.mnemonic: Their true loyalty exists in the middle of their hearts.

hints.author: dwhitman
hints.mnemonic: Your loyalty is to what's in your heart.

hints.author: zardoz73
hints.mnemonic: Hachiko, the most loyal dog of all, has a statue in his honor in the middle of the heart of Shibuya.

hints.author: frozach
hints.mnemonic: After the British soldiers executed the French archers, they dissected their bodies, only to find French flags INSIDE them, wrapping around their HEARTS. Now that shows true LOYALTY.

hints.author: adhmm
hints.mnemonic: The evil genius guaranteed himself the loyalty of his minions by placing explosives in the middle of their hearts.

hints.author: Texie
hints.mnemonic: This is a pictograph if ever I saw one. Two chunks of meat on a skewer.

hints.author: poopdeedoo
hints.mnemonic: Naka naka , "who's there?" shish kebab .... "shish kebab who?".

hints.author: shadolite
hints.mnemonic: The actual definition of this kanji is "a skewer," which I believe is much more helpful as a primitive. Just think, two mouths skewered on same stick.

hints.author: alantin
hints.mnemonic: The skewer that runs through the two junks of shish kebab.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Pictograph, see book.

hints.author: cheechuan
hints.mnemonic: A person who is afflicted with the vampire disease can only be killed with a sheesh-kebab through the heart.

hints.author: Howdoken
hints.mnemonic: If you eat too many shish kebabs, your heart will be afflicted with cholesterol.

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: If you are afflicted with severe heartburn, eating a spicy shish kebab will feel only slightly less painful than having it jammed straight into your heart.

hints.author: nagisa
hints.mnemonic: A person who has been truly afflicted with the pain of love feels as if a giant shish kebab has been shoved through their heart.

hints.author: CSBarnes
hints.mnemonic: A skewered heart is afflicted with pain.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Think with your brain NOT your heart.

hints.author: PacifistGod
hints.mnemonic: To think is to use your brain over your heart.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Thinking too much with our brains, and not enough with our hearts, leads to many of our life's pains and sorrows. This kanji reminds us that thinking, while an activity of the brain, should always have the support of the heart.

hints.author: dizzwave
hints.mnemonic: Thinking requires the brain and the heart.

hints.author: Norman
hints.mnemonic: Think with both your brain and your heart.

hints.author: Codexus
hints.mnemonic: Grace here is a favor freely bestowed, like a good deed. So to remember this kanji, go to the local shelter, find a big dog pent up in a small cage and adopt him. That will cause a warm feeling in your heart!

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: This kanji tells us that wherever heart is the cause, grace is the consequence. Think of “grace” as a graceful act

hints.author: lifeflaw
hints.mnemonic: Grace is when you give from your heart to serve a higher cause.

hints.author: CountPacula
hints.mnemonic: A grace is a gift whose only cause for being given comes from the heart. WARNING

hints.author: astgtciv
hints.mnemonic: Grace Kelly died because of her heart condition. I.e., her heart was the cause. It was because of all that dancing... that's how the story goes. But really, what happened is that she accidentally locked in her St. Bernard for 5 days without food, and when she came back home he ripped out and swallowed her heart.

hints.author: astgtciv
hints.mnemonic: [bravo, scottamus!] To apply for the job as a (replacement) Batman, you have to make it to the heart of the cave past all the traps he set up to test you. There, you see a table with the application form on it. Now that you think about it, the ad in the paper did say "Those who don't make it to the heart of the cave need not apply.".

hints.author: ikmys
hints.mnemonic: In the videogame Zelda, Link enters a CAVE to visit a fairy that will APPLY magic to fill his HEART containers.

hints.author: yukkuri_kame
hints.mnemonic: Heisig's keyword doesn't apply this kanji directly. 応用する （おうようする）means "to apply" as in 彼らは新しい科学技術をその産業に応用した。 "They applied new technology to the industry." The most common translation of 応 (on it's own without 用 ) might be "respond". As in responding to a question or responding to a situation. Story

hints.author: Virtua_Leaf
hints.mnemonic: Said the doctor

hints.author: scottamus
hints.mnemonic: Batman applied himself to catwoman deep in the heart of bat cave.

hints.author: onsen_monkey
hints.mnemonic: When you get a good IDEA you get excited and you can hear the SOUND of your HEART, it's pounding so hard.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Picture someone who's just had a great idea, but in place of a blinking light bulb over their head, you see a heart thumping with great noise. Imagine the greater the idea, the louder the sound of the beating heart.

hints.author: nilfisq
hints.mnemonic: The best ideas are sound ideas that come right from the heart!

hints.author: Atomik
hints.mnemonic: The Frenchman René-Théophile-Hyacinthe Laennec is best known for a great idea he had in 1816, when he invented a device to listen to the sound of a patient's heart

hints.author: aelirri
hints.mnemonic: A good idea will always sound right in your heart.

hints.author: astridtops
hints.mnemonic: Cowardice is the situation where you get the thought that maybe running away and saving your flesh is a good idea.

hints.author: timcampbell
hints.mnemonic: Cowardice is when you are not willing to sacrifice your flesh for your ideas.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: A real brave person would never put their flesh before their ideas. That's why so many people have been killed - for example, in China, where people showed cowardice in the face of capitalism. They weren't willing to put their flesh behind their ideas. Note that flesh is the "strong" or "main" radical in this kanji, which lets you know that this person is emphasizing flesh, and thus, exhibiting cowardice.

hints.author: manubear
hints.mnemonic: "Er, I've got a good idea, let's hide on the moon" says the cowardly Shaggy in Scooby Doo ( 臆病な ).

hints.author: Aeryon
hints.mnemonic: Man 1

hints.author: cheechuan
hints.mnemonic: The concept of love is basically two hearts inter-acting as one.

hints.author: Francois
hints.mnemonic: ''Inter-heart'' is a new therapy CONCEPT that helps macho guys share their feelings with each other.

hints.author: Wizard
hints.mnemonic: Newton realised the concept when he was sitting under a tree, and an apple smacked him in the head. He stood up, eyes wide, heart racing, for he had discovered gravity!

hints.author: Clint
hints.mnemonic: When you find a concept that really moves you, such as the concepts of mercy, forgiveness and compassion, the reason they do so is the fact that the mental component of these concepts inter-act with your heart (to avoid mixing up the keywords for idea and concept, remember

hints.author: zodiac
hints.mnemonic: When you finally manage to explain a difficult concept to someone, it feels as if your hearts are inter-connected.

hints.author: Howdoken
hints.mnemonic: Your breath brings oxygen in through your nose which is then pumped around your body by your heart.

hints.author: Shibo
hints.mnemonic: I think I've met my dream girl, but there's a problem. her breath is horrible! So, do I listen to my nose or my heart?

hints.author: wynterp
hints.mnemonic: From Genesis 2

hints.author: Izumo
hints.mnemonic: BREATH brings oxygen from your nose to your heart.

hints.author: timcampbell
hints.mnemonic: Someone has almost drowned. We plug their NOSE as we breath into them, then listen to see if the HEART starts beating.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Recess to me is a school break. At recess some kiddies are comparing their latest body piercings. Tongues and noses are nothing special. The new cool is to have your heart done!

hints.author: strugglebunny
hints.mnemonic: At recess, little boys stick their tongues out and pick their noses while little girls draw hearts on the ground with chalk. It's winter now, so any tongues --left-- out for too long will freeze.

hints.author: matt_jenkins
hints.mnemonic: Ah recess; tongues slandering, noses being turned up, and beneath it all, young hearts being broken. Dominant in playgrounds is the noise of tongues, which helps me remember that in this kanji tongue comes first.

hints.author: Johan
hints.mnemonic: The recess is a remote place for meditation. You sit meditating with other monks, breathing though your nose, holding your tongue (keeping quiet), and finding peace in your heart.

hints.author: j0k0m0
hints.mnemonic: At recess...tongues flapping , noses running, hearts racing. wheeee! 休憩 きゅうけい　Imagine the skinny teacher from The Simpsons saying "we're gonna have recess now children, nnnkay". けい.

hints.author: Nukemarine
hints.mnemonic: Too easy. Imagine the Wizard of OZ. There, the three heroes asked the Wizard for three FAVORS

hints.author: samuize
hints.mnemonic: If you would give someone 10 fields as a favor then you truly have a big heart. Or, people who do lots of favors for others have a heart as big as 10 fields, a "10-field-heart".

hints.author: joxn_costello
hints.mnemonic: "Igor, do me a favor

hints.author: usis35
hints.mnemonic: -Do me a FAVOR, give me TEN FIELDS (I am talking to someone who owns a lot of fields), and I will thank you from my HEART !

hints.author: jameserb
hints.mnemonic: "Ten fields and my heart for my lady's favor!" cried Lord Fancypants.

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: If your heart surgeon is mediocre in his craft, you have plenty of reason to fear. ("Oops, I think I left my scissors in there").

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: My deep dark fear at the bottom of my heart is that I am mediocre at my craft.

hints.author: darg_sama
hints.mnemonic: Some have called the US the culture of fear. Fear is a craft that mediocre leaders use to control the hearts of the populace.

hints.author: Perry
hints.mnemonic: I have an unusual fear - when I'm sleeping, the mediocre I-beam above my bed will fall and crush my heart. The builder was certainly mediocre, the I-beam is not even quite straight! Could fall any time...

hints.author: delenir
hints.mnemonic: Fear will craft a mediocre heart.

hints.author: nilfisq
hints.mnemonic: She was beguiled/mislead by his charm

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: The same cowboy from frame # 356 (elements mouth, floor and fiesta), kisses the floor with his mouth, once again, before going to the fiesta. There, he uses his good looks to beguile women (gets them to buy him drinks or such), by playing with their hearts.

hints.author: Perry
hints.mnemonic: I like to think of this character as Guile from Street Fighter 2, beguiling Chun Li at the fiesta. He kisses her on the mouth, they do it on the floor. Then, remembering his job, he rips out her heart, Mortal Kombat style. "which character are you gonna be?" "I'm gonna be Guile" (Partly inspired by nilfisq's).

hints.author: crystalcastlecreature
hints.mnemonic: This kanji actually means BEWILDERED. At the fiesta, he was kissing the floor with all his heart. Everyone was bewildered.

hints.author: NickCooper
hints.mnemonic: At the fiesta I decided to beguile the crowd by performing a trick where I pull out my heart and throw it on the ground. It worked, their mouths hit the floor!

hints.author: szreter
hints.mnemonic: Emotion is a march of mouths inside your heart telling you what to feel.

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: Strong EMOTIONS don't stay hidden. They march right out of one's heart (below) and out one's mouth (shouted, snarled, or gently whispered - depending on exactly what kind of emotion it is!).

hints.author: harusame
hints.mnemonic: When you get emotional, words come marching out of your mouth from your heart, and it's impossible to stop them.

hints.author: DrWarrior12
hints.mnemonic: Picture a site that consists solely of emoticons (represented by the mouth) marching across the screen - you know, hundreds of them. Imagine how much this website would slow down your computer. At this point you might consider stabbing the site's creator in the heart. (inspired by taijuando).

hints.author: matt_jenkins
hints.mnemonic: Emoticons held a march to protest against their low status in communication. Along went all those little mouths, shouting as one, riding not on horses but big squidgy hearts, bouncing one pace with each beat. Sadly, many were 'tired and EMOTIONal' (euphemism for 'drunk' in the British Press) and they all started squabbling, at which point the march fell apart.

hints.author: rizzo
hints.mnemonic: Melancholy makes me think of Hamlet cause he was so 'emo'. In order to play up his feelings he bares his head and holds his crown over his heart then walks (on walking legs) around the palace making everyone see how melancholy he is. What a wuss.

hints.author: howdycowdy
hints.mnemonic: This is an image of the crucifixion. Jesus is on the cross. His crown of thorns has slipped down and is around his neck, right between his head and his heart. His walking legs can be seen dangling from the cross as well. How MELANCHOLY!

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: In the middle of summer you lose both your crown and your heart. No wonder you feel melancholy.

hints.author: FutureBlues
hints.mnemonic: In the Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi, reality was all in her head, leading to situations where her melancholic feelings in her heart would be released into bubble-like crowns of negative space where they'd walk around on their legs and wreck havoc.

hints.author: skinnyneo
hints.mnemonic: The most melancholy places of all is a funeral. This is a funeral for the Burger King guy, where everybody takes the paper crowns that they were given off of their head and covers their heart with it. Each person then uses their walking legs to come up to the casket and throw in a whopper.

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: The new widow sits in the house, her head in her lap (the extended stroke), her dagger in her husband.

hints.author: narafan
hints.mnemonic: The house's head, her husband, was murdered with a dagger. You can still see the drops of blood above the dagger. She is now a widow.

hints.author: wazato
hints.mnemonic: Extending Megaqwerty's story, the widow sits in the house with her head leaned forward in her lap so that her long pig-tails are stretched out to the floor. In between her pig-tails lies the dagger used to kill her husband.

hints.author: mikemorr
hints.mnemonic: The widow is head of the house now that she's been parted from her husband. part (#781 分).

hints.author: ashman63
hints.mnemonic: After I found my husband in the house with his head chopped off by a dagger, I realised I'd become a widow.

hints.author: Ricardo
hints.mnemonic: Busy (as in "occupied") means a state of mind where all other thoughts are perished.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: ^^^Make the "state of mind" primitive Data (from Star Trek) instead right now and save yourself the headache; 'state of mind' is too vague! (Data can stay so busy as not to sleep without dying. He's a robot).

hints.author: jackhuddleston
hints.mnemonic: Some people who are workaholics say, "I can rest when I'm dead." That is the sort of state of mind a busy person has!

hints.author: AndamanIslander
hints.mnemonic: Poor Japanese people are so busy. They work like 80 hour weeks! Slowly, you see them turn into automatons...their bodies still alive, but their state of mind like they've long ago perished... (Mental image

hints.author: vosmiura
hints.mnemonic: As others have suggested, I personified "state of mind" as the android, Data from here on. He is constanly analysing humans and emotions, plus he has an overactive mind for good measure. --- Data's is busy trying to understand why do humans perish (die). --- (If it helps bring Data to mind, think of "Data-base is busy, please try again later").

hints.author: ruuku35
hints.mnemonic: ECSTASY alters our STATE OF MIND and makes us DEVILS.

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: The state of mind that horny teenagers are looking for.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: The devil sells Data some ecstasy saying it will make him, like, human, man.

hints.author: kfmfe04
hints.mnemonic: Someone offers you ecstasy at a rave party. Cool, logical Data is on one shoulder saying "No, don't take it!". The devil is on your other shoulder saying "You know you want it!".

hints.author: Doodsaq
hints.mnemonic: Data was in a state of ecstasy on the holodeck when he loaded up the new program full of horny teenagers that he stole from Riker.

hints.author: dwhitman
hints.mnemonic: Constancy is holding the same state of mind over a long span of time. (tweaking PepeSeco and mspertus).

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data is the epitome of constancy. As a robot, his consistency spans the entire day.

hints.author: sutebun
hints.mnemonic: A term used by Kant. Kant says that humans are preconditioned to experience the world in space and time, but God's mind has Constancy. That is, God's is a state of mind that spans all time and is not inhibited by it.

hints.author: ivoSF
hints.mnemonic: Imagine a giant field of grass where a man sits trying to abtain zen, he sit still as a statue, holding his fingertips against eachother, while the day and night (the spanning of the day) shoot pass you like in a 100000x forwarded movie. the seasons change but yet the man does not move. that whole picture combined gives me a feel of constancy.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Data couldn't break the span of his CONSTANCY of his state of mind (ooh double reinforcement) if he tried. Just watch

hints.author: szreter
hints.mnemonic: When the world's most eminent magician died, everyone's state of mind became that of lamentation. He was buried with his famous sun-flower wand in his hand.

hints.author: vosmiura
hints.mnemonic: Data laments that he could never see his eminent father, his creator, ever again. He paints a picture of his father, that looks like a sunflower in the shape of a magic wand.

hints.author: ambassadog
hints.mnemonic: Closely related to grief, mourning and regret, it was difficult for me to isolate this kanji. A lament is a song or poem that deals with loss or regret. This brings to mind the works of the world's most eminent artists, their brilliance and powerful works owed to their emotional states of mind.

hints.author: vicnet
hints.mnemonic: Lament is the state of mind most eminent people live in, because so many expectations lay on their shoulders.

hints.author: pmbeddall
hints.mnemonic: Instead of using eminent - use its components - divining rod and sunflower. Think of the current state of the environment symbolized by the sunflower and use the divining rod to see the possible future - pollution, global warming, overpopulation - we have a lot to lament.

hints.author: ruisu
hints.mnemonic: Enlightenment is a state of mind that goes beyond the five senses.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data finds enlightenment when he discovers the answer to the question, "Who am I?". (Image

hints.author: Francois
hints.mnemonic: Enlightment, a state of mind that I must find. Only I can find this state of mind.

hints.author: cullingsong
hints.mnemonic: What the hell is liosama talking about? (under me).

hints.author: liosama
hints.mnemonic: Heisig's was so perfect, getting all that saliva in on my pinkies after having been caught by my mother doing some absolutely stupid sign while looking at a book has shown her that i've reached enlightment too, she walked out. To be honest i would have rather been caught doing something less... obscure..

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: Someone in a dreadful state of mind has crawled into his bed and is hiding under the sheets (linens).

hints.author: dwhitman
hints.mnemonic: From the Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy

hints.author: ihatobu
hints.mnemonic: Being an android, Data is white as a sheet. Doctor Crusher always has to remind herself that this is perfectly normal. From a doctor's perspective, he really does look dreadful.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: What would be your state of mind after seeing some linen animate and fly down a hallway (a ghost) ? Surely, full of dread. Hence, dreadful. Picture someone experiencing dread, trying to reach for the big switch on top of their head, to turn off their mind because they are so scared.

hints.author: zardoz73
hints.mnemonic: Data goes to the holodeck and loads up dread. He's suddenly in a haunted gothic mansion, and a stereotypical ghost made of a mere linen sheet flies at him. "I do not understand this human emotion of dread. This is merely a sheet" he says.

hints.author: PepeSeco
hints.mnemonic: (re

hints.author: dshill99
hints.mnemonic: When I am disconcerted my state of mind is "laid to waste".

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Data walks in and sees Picard weeping. "What is the matter, Captain?" Picard looks up, and replies that his entire home planet has been laid to waste. Data, the master of tact, offers up this consolation

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: In this kanji we see a disconcerted as a mind which has been laid waste by a flood of contradicting information. Try to picture someone's head being flooded, looking left and right in disconcert, and the switch on top of their head turning on and off uncontrollably.

hints.author: vosmiura
hints.mnemonic: Data was disconcerted to find that he had been laid waste in a robot scrap yard. "This is very disconcerting", he says in the calmest possible manner given his unfortunate predicament. Make sure you see him there, looking around trying to analyse how his Captain could have abandoned him.

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: "For all have sinned..." so everyone's state of mind should be to repent.

hints.author: smujohnson
hints.mnemonic: When you repent, you heal your state of mind by going over every thing you regret doing.

hints.author: Haych
hints.mnemonic: Repent

hints.author: MeisterLlama
hints.mnemonic: Data in the confessional

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: An evangelical minister screams at Data to, Repent of every sin!!" Data just replies that there is not 'every' sin to repent from since as a robot, he cannot sin.

hints.author: eriklc
hints.mnemonic: Like the saying goes, Hate just begets Hate. A state of mind that just increases and increases until it explodes.

hints.author: Rivvie
hints.mnemonic: Your state of mind would turn to hate when someone would take away a loved one that was formerly yours.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data's one true emotion is hate for Prince's music. (Image

hints.author: Captain+Kanjipants
hints.mnemonic: Hate is the state of mind that turned the man who was formerly Anakin Skywalker into Darth Vader.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Hate is unfortunately a state of mind on the increase in today's society. You may picture hate as a green face with red eyes, multiplying wildly (see frame 501 “formerly”). If the mnemonic doesn't do the job, add the state-of-mind switch.

hints.author: narafan
hints.mnemonic: Some hardcore monks have a state of mind that has become accustomed to their self-torture through piercing themselves.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: It took him awhile, but Data finally got ACCUSTOMED to his nipple/breast piercings. They were constantly rubbing up against his shirt and his heart-shaped locket. Picture Data, shirtless, squeezing his nipples in front of Picard and saying "Yes, at first they were a bit shelly, but I've grown quite ACCUSTOMED to them". That last bit should do it for you.

hints.author: dsamari
hints.mnemonic: At first I thought that seeing people getting so many piercings was gross, but as time goes by your state of mind gets accustomed to it.

hints.author: elanlan
hints.mnemonic: The previous generations had the state of mind that piercings were outlandish, but now the general public has become accustomed to this practice.

hints.author: Wosret
hints.mnemonic: Through a trained state of mind one can become accustomed to being pierced by sharp objects.

hints.author: nest0r
hints.mnemonic: At the meeting of butchers, in their narrow state of mind, they throw lame jokes around like, 'Oh hello, it's a pleasure to meat you', and find this rather pleasing.

hints.author: Kurisu
hints.mnemonic: Image

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: Manson? Bundy? Jack the Ripper? Whichever killer or butcher brings to mind the most graphic image (maybe a meeting of all of them?) - you won't forget this kanji as you peer into their deranged state of mind

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: A meeting of butchers has dissolved into an orgy of blood-squirting violence. But since the killing state of mind is the highest pleasure a butcher can experience, they are all smiles.

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: Pleasure is the state of mind when flesh meets flesh (especially when one flesh is sabre-like).

hints.author: johnzep
hints.mnemonic: When I am in a LAZY state of mind I use my left hand to play with my meat...it feels like someone else is doing it, which is good cause I'm to lazy to get a date.

hints.author: iheckman
hints.mnemonic: When in a lazy state of mind, the things you need to do are left for next month.

hints.author: darg_sama
hints.mnemonic: This may only work for me, but I just think that the left side of my body is the lazy side. It sometimes takes over and puts my whole body in a lazy state of mind.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data was just being lazy when he claimed the left side of his body had malfunctioned and he couldn't help.

hints.author: dizzwave
hints.mnemonic: Picard notices that the Enterprise is off course, and shouts, "Data! I told you to turn left at the moon! What happened?" Data replies, with his characteristic eyebrow-raise, "I don't know, sir. I just didn't feel like doing it. Is that what humans call.... lazy?".

hints.author: dwhitman
hints.mnemonic: Humility is the state of mind of accepting the truth about yourself - both favorable and unfavorable. (tweaked version of Raichu's).

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: Humility is a state of mind when you consider yourself in accordance with the truth (you neither boast nor demean yourself).

hints.author: scout
hints.mnemonic: Data, who is convinced he is perfect, is taught a lesson in humility when Riker shows him how to extract truth from someone by placing them on a workbench and poking them in the eye with a needle. Data just didn't understand how to play with the person's state of mind.

hints.author: Wosret
hints.mnemonic: Humility is the state of mind of accepting the truth no matter how much you don't like it.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data has great humility even though he knows more truth than any human.

hints.author: stauff
hints.mnemonic: Remorse is the state of mind where I feel bad for what I did while I was tired and emotional!

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: Tip

hints.author: jamiemw
hints.mnemonic: Data feels remorse for stealing the human emotion chip.

hints.author: Shibo
hints.mnemonic: Data feels remorse for stealing the human emotion chip. So, he takes it out. Then his remorse is gone so he puts it back in.. Then he takes it out. This could go on for a while, couldn't it? (thanks jamiemw!).

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: This kanji shows remorse (regret) as a mind filled with emotions from the past, coming back to “bite at” one's conscience and disturb one's piece of mind.

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: Recollection is about bringing ideas back to your mind.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Data's recollection powers are unparalled. He never loses a single idea.

hints.author: AdamLeliel
hints.mnemonic: I have no recollection of my state of mind from last night, dude... I must have been drunk or something. Do you have any idea what I did last night, man?

hints.author: vicnet
hints.mnemonic: Recollection is the state of mind where one brings ideas back in one's mind.

hints.author: jabberwockychortles
hints.mnemonic: Recollection is a state of mind where old ideas are contemplated.

hints.author: Gaignun
hints.mnemonic: When sitting through laser eye surgery, the surgeon stretches open your eye with a tight-fitting tool. The thought of a laser cutting through the lens of your eye within moments, and possibly blinding you in the case of a mishap, makes for a very disquieting state of mind.

hints.author: Elphalpo
hints.mnemonic: Disquiet

hints.author: thecite
hints.mnemonic: dread

hints.author: hissatsu
hints.mnemonic: What is all that racket!? My state of mind is disquieted by extended tool use!

hints.author: melchan
hints.mnemonic: Disquieting is the state of mind you get after seeing a table full of tools with little eyes staring at you.

hints.author: cameron_en
hints.mnemonic: A paedophile's state of mind is to yearn for juveniles.

hints.author: aircawn
hints.mnemonic: A juvenile's state of mind tends to go apeshit when they see something they yearn for. Usually involving jumping up and down, tantrums, and other bullshit. (Imagine giving them a big backhand across the face.).

hints.author: herman
hints.mnemonic: Whenever Data sees a computer he has a yearning to stand on top of it and act juvenile. He really has to control this yearning. Picture Data looking wistfully at a computer and imagining himself standing on top of it in a thought bubble to the right.

hints.author: anragreg
hints.mnemonic: Data YEARNS for juveniles- bad robot!

hints.author: mantixen
hints.mnemonic: The state of mind of a juvenile tends to yearn for things like fortune or fame.

hints.author: FooSoft
hints.mnemonic: I'm in a state of mind where I desire to see the sun over the capital for some nice scenery for a change (no more rain!).

hints.author: perrin4869
hints.mnemonic: Think of a commercial designed at making you hanker for the product they're advertising. See how they cleverly use that scenery to put you in the state of mind they desire.

hints.author: algarich
hints.mnemonic: A prison cell can be nice for a while, but after some time your state of mind will change and you will hanker for more scenery.

hints.author: aaroncp
hints.mnemonic: I'm often in a state of mind where I desire to see some beautiful scenery. That's why traveling is necessary to keep me in a good state of mind.

hints.author: CasualTatsumaki
hints.mnemonic: The scenery of Texas puts Data in the state of mind to hanker for a Roy's roast beef burger.

hints.author: aircawn
hints.mnemonic: Pining, yearn for... etc. Presumably for lost love. An easy one here, someone standing in the graveyard, placing an old valentine card amonst all the existing tributes.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Morticia and Gomez (of the “Addams Family”) are spending their Valentine's Day at the graveyard, pining for each other's affection.

hints.author: astridtops
hints.mnemonic: Remember the dead parrot from Monty Python's parrot's sketch? The shop owner said that the Norwegian Blue was pining for the fjords! But of course it should have been put in the graveyard already. Poor buyer, he meant to give the bird away as a valentine present...

hints.author: szreter
hints.mnemonic: I am in the graveyard pining for my lost valentine.

hints.author: SammyB
hints.mnemonic: Imagine an 'emo' kid pining away in a graveyard because his valentine didn't turn up... His emo make-up is running because he's crying now. (Emo kids like to hang out in graveyards 'because it's cool' or something and they were going to have a date there).

hints.author: ihatobu
hints.mnemonic: Hawaii is a little drop of heaven nestled in the waters of the Pacific, most often visited by honeymooners and valentines. It was annexed to the U.S.A. in 1959, and more recently to Japan as well-- albeit only unofficially, and through private commercial holdings.

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: Tip 1

hints.author: ruisu
hints.mnemonic: He drank all the holy water, so god annexed his heart to heaven.

hints.author: Ceryn
hints.mnemonic: First learn 忝 【ＧＲＡＴＥＦＵＬ】 (I was very GRATEFUL to have recieved a VALENTINE straight from HEAVEN.) It's a rare kanji used in かたじけない which means grateful. Then 添 【ＡＮＮＥＸＥＤ】 (You should be GRATEFUL the city just ANNEXED some land and is building a new WATER park.).

hints.author: Spidercat
hints.mnemonic: You shed tears (water) as your departed valentine is annexed to the heavens.

hints.author: dwhitman
hints.mnemonic: You swear you'll be in love forever, but invariably there comes a time when your heart is divided.

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: For this kanji I invariably got the stroke order wrong. I nearly lost heart, but decided to stick (pun) to it. Then I noticed the order is 1) katakana ソ (altered slightly); 2) fishhook; 3) two drops. Now I invariably get it right.

hints.author: sgrant
hints.mnemonic: A stake through the heart invariably kills a vampire. (As a primitive this can take the meaning 'vampire').

hints.author: Christoph
hints.mnemonic: A heart that has been slashed becomes invariably altered forever.

hints.author: matstc
hints.mnemonic: When you say 'cross my heart', you will invariably keep your word.

hints.author: rizzo
hints.mnemonic: Anything full of water will invariably begin to ooze.

hints.author: DrJones
hints.mnemonic: When you pierce a heart with a stake, it invariably oozes blood.

hints.author: thegeelonghellswan
hints.mnemonic: The invariably divided heart is... oozing water? Is it crying because it is broken?

hints.author: lee101
hints.mnemonic: Heisig, your a great man. Don't let people tell you overwise. Don't let them get you down ok?

hints.author: nath04
hints.mnemonic: When you divide Michael Phelps' heart, water oozes out instead of blood.

hints.author: decamer0n
hints.mnemonic: This pictograph actually really works if you look at it as a hand with fingers spread and middle finger pointing down. see the very top stroke as the edge of a shirt cuff, and it will all come together.

hints.author: mantixen
hints.mnemonic: A hand is useful for 千一 (1001) things.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die. (the 6-fingered man).

hints.author: smithsonian
hints.mnemonic: Heisig says it's not a very good pictograph of a human hand, but it is a good pictograph of a cartoon hand. Picture Mickey Mouse's distinctive white glove with its three fingers and a thumb. The kanji that use this element can also use Mickey Mouse as a primitive element in place of hand.

hints.author: Tornadic_Indignation
hints.mnemonic: The slightly bent nail went through two of the hand's fingers (this one is pretty easy to memorize).

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: It's a hot day of summer with a clear sky, you're sitting outside a cafe (or maybe on a reclining chair in the garden), and you watch over the kids with a hand covering your eyes from the sunlight (next time, don't forget the sunglasses).

hints.author: blackstockc
hints.mnemonic: Think of the monster from Pan's Labrynth, that watched over the poor girl with eyes in the palm of his hands.

hints.author: captal
hints.mnemonic: I picture a lifeguard standing in his tower with his hand over his eyes, watching over the swimmers below (might work better for Australians- picturing that distinctive yellow and red cap).

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: My parents watch over me

hints.author: submacrolize
hints.mnemonic: It's a Hamsa, that hand shaped trinket from the Middle East that WATCHES OVER the wearer and protects against the evil eye. If you've never seen one, check this out and this kanji is yours

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: If you grind the hemp without a stone but use your hand instead it will chafe. (Image

hints.author: Amadan
hints.mnemonic: Imagine sliding down a hemp rope, without gloves, just bare hands. Chafes, doesn't it?

hints.author: scout
hints.mnemonic: When the feds came to bust your little hemp grove, you jumped out the back side of the cave and tried to repel down with a hemp rope. Unfortunately, the rope chafed your hands and you fell .. ouch!

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Think of chafe in the sense of “friction” for this particular kanji. There are many garments made of hemp (though maybe not gloves). Contemporary hemp clothes are likely very comfortable, but for this story let's imagine rudimentary gloves which are coarse and rough like the unprocessed hemp fiber, and hence, chafe your hands.

hints.author: rowdyphantom
hints.mnemonic: Growing hemp chafes your hands.

hints.author: GhettoPenguin
hints.mnemonic: Someone with a huge EGO is too good for any romantic partner and as such has nothing but personal "hand fiestas" with himself every night.

hints.author: frozach
hints.mnemonic: Did you hear about the guy who had such a big EGO that he threw a fiesta for his left hand?

hints.author: dukelexon
hints.mnemonic: At a truly excellent gay fiesta, hands are used to stroke more than just each other's egos. Graphic, perhaps ... maybe even disturbing for a few of you more prudish/phobic types ... but damned if it won't stick this way.

hints.author: haole
hints.mnemonic: That guy has such a huge ego. He had to have a hand in everything to do with planning the fiesta.

hints.author: bigloui
hints.mnemonic: The truly egotistical prefer a hand-fiesta to anything anyone else can give them. Ok, its not a lovely image, but its kind of memorable. Big ego

hints.author: jyoung
hints.mnemonic: Righteous Christians are sheep with egos (reworked from raulir, fixes word order to match radical order).

hints.author: lynbroughton
hints.mnemonic: Follow the path of RIGHTEOUSNESS like sheep follow the shepherd , let go of your ego.

hints.author: GhettoPenguin
hints.mnemonic: On the other hand, Woman tend to have too much self-righteousness to allow any man to touch their wooly black sheep this results in similar hand fiestas.

hints.author: alantin
hints.mnemonic: Putting the lamb of God ahead of your own ego and seeking His will before all else. This is true righteousness.

hints.author: Clint
hints.mnemonic: Christians believe one attains righteousness by elevating the Agnus Dei, or "Lamb of God", above the whims of one's ego (with thanks to axelb!).

hints.author: decamer0n
hints.mnemonic: Careful deliberation produces words of righteousness.

hints.author: samusam
hints.mnemonic: At the worst of times, a jury's deliberation descends into a war of words between competing self-righteous, power-tripping bastards.

hints.author: Lozza
hints.mnemonic: Picture Samuel L Jackson's character in Pulp Fiction carefully deliberating over what words to say to freak someone out before killing them. He even browses through a list of bible quotations for inspiration. Then he finds it!... "the path of the righteous man".

hints.author: MeisterLlama
hints.mnemonic: WARNING

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: [+yorkii] Socrates, the righteous man that he is, is DELIBERATing on whether or not the sheep in front of him has an ego. He is also DELIBERATing on whether or not to give the sheep a hand fiesta. Tempting....

hints.author: zwarte_kat
hints.mnemonic: A cow that is righteous sacrifices her milk for the human race.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Cows are truly righteous animals. They SACRIFICE their milk so that we can have some. And if they don't have any left, they give a sheep a hand fiesta (good lord this is going too far) and give us that instead. What righteous cows.

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: There are two kanji that need to be kept separate

hints.author: Rivvie
hints.mnemonic: Vegetarians sacrifice eating steak (cow) because they believe it is a righteous thing to do.

hints.author: MYRRIA
hints.mnemonic: In the old testament times, COWS were SACRIFICE for RIGHTEOUSNESS.

hints.author: johnzep
hints.mnemonic: I like to RUB my FINGERS over my EXTREMITIES ....like my extremity-ly long, umm, hair.... This has been edited in response to being reported ...you can change "hair" to whatever extremity-ly long body part you like.

hints.author: forestsprite
hints.mnemonic: When you're cold, your RUB your FINGERS over your EXTREMITIES vigorously to warm up a bit. I'd still rather go in for a warm fire and some hot cocoa, though.

hints.author: samusam
hints.mnemonic: Picture Mr. Burn's rubbing the extremities of his fingers together and saying "excellent...".

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: This is easy. What other extremities could you possibly use to RUB something? We use our fingers, of course. (I do appreciate the tendency to read perverted things into kanji, but sometimes a more logical approach is better).

hints.author: romanrozhok
hints.mnemonic: This means rub as in "rubbed out" or "erased."-- 抹消 【まっしょう】 (n,vs) erasure; delete (e.g., DEL character); (P). 抹殺 【まっさつ】 (n,vs) erasure; denial; obliteration; ignoring (an opinion); (P) 抹茶 (P); 末茶 (iK) 【まっちゃ】 (n) powdered green tea for ceremonies; (P) STORY

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: Why carry a handkerchief? I wipe my nose finger-style.

hints.author: oregum
hints.mnemonic: It is not my STYLE to use my FINGERS to WIPE my butt.

hints.author: astridtops
hints.mnemonic: If you are going to wipe your nose with your fingers, better do it in a grand style.

hints.author: mantixen
hints.mnemonic: Using your finger is just one style of wiping. I use toilet paper.

hints.author: EratiK
hints.mnemonic: We've all seen those hip-hop videos where they wipe their shoulder with their fingers, and it's supposed to be the height of style.

hints.author: Splatted
hints.mnemonic: He quickly yanked his fingers out of the vase. Maybe no one noticed the attempt to steal the cookies...

hints.author: Meconium
hints.mnemonic: As well as the meaning of 'taking captive', this also means 'crush' or 'batter'. One also often sees it written in Chinese, with the meaning "pull". (I think this is where 拉麺 comes from - 'drawn' or perhaps 'flattened' noodles.) My keyword is crush (I crushed my fingers trying to lift a heavy vase) but Ramen or the other common use for this kanji in Japanese, Latin (it's the abbreviation for the Latin language) would also be appropriate, as they help you learn the reading (ラ).

hints.author: Boy.pockets
hints.mnemonic: He yanked his finger out of the vase upon discovering it had a venus fly trap in it.

hints.author: thecite
hints.mnemonic: kidnapper

hints.author: Dakoina
hints.mnemonic: RTK supplement

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: When embracing someone, wrap your fingers around her butt for added effect. You may think of "bound with snakes" as a description of the fingers slithering around the buttocks, if you want a particularly graphic image.

hints.author: Nukemarine
hints.mnemonic: Here, I'm picturing that scene from ET (the extra terrestrial), where ET hugs Elliot before leaving. You see that EMBRACE is ET's long FINGERS that WRAP around Elliot.

hints.author: Kurisu
hints.mnemonic: Ladies; for a truly intimate embrace your fingers should be wrapped around your man's....imagine binding his snake with your fingers.

hints.author: Peppi
hints.mnemonic: King Kong's way to embrace Ann Darrow (the blond beauty) is to wrap his fingers around her. He is too huge to embrace her like everybody else.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: From 風の谷のナウシカ . Nausicaa is embraced by the Ohm's finger like tenticles. The effect is very similar to raulir's "bound with snakes" image.

hints.author: decamer0n
hints.mnemonic: Ok, this is a little wierd, but i took this back to the kanji for pagoda (#254 塔). I think it helps simplify the image, and also helps anchor the pagoda kanji in memory better as an added bonus. say this aloud once, and i think it will bring out a vivid image very quickly

hints.author: taijuando
hints.mnemonic: When you board the ship on the way out from Hawaii a beautiful crewmember takes her fingers and fits a lei around you ....a lei is flowers fitted together with your fingers.

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: A romantic scene. A woman stands near to her sailor, rolling the lone flower that he gave her between her fingers because she is sad that he must leave. When the time comes for the captain to shout, "All aboard!," the sailor bends deeply forward to give her one final "meeting of the mouths," powerful enough to cause her flower to drop out of her fingers and into the sea.

hints.author: tharvey
hints.mnemonic: All aboard! Fingers waving goodbye, flowers tossed in the air, and the meeting of mouths as lovers say goodbye.

hints.author: breton
hints.mnemonic: A new torture technique called "flower-boarding" instead of the popular "water-boarding". It's quite simple

hints.author: Zarxrax
hints.mnemonic: You can extract her juices by inserting a few fingers.

hints.author: kyotokanji
hints.mnemonic: The mafia want to extract information from you. You don't say a word, so out comes the knife. They cut of your fingers until you only have a few left and then you speak.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: You are at a the university library preparing a summary of some litterature and with your thumb, index and little finger (a few fingers) you point at a few passages to extract. Note

hints.author: kirigirisu
hints.mnemonic: Breaking a few fingers is an excellent way to extract information.

hints.author: jabberwockychortles
hints.mnemonic: You've heard about that monkey who put his hand in the candy jar and grabbed so many pieces that he couldn't extract his hand? This Kanji is a lesson in how to extract, because if you put your fingers in the jar and only grab a few, then you will be able to extract them easily.

hints.author: Stormchild
hints.mnemonic: Gandalf confronts the evil beast, shouting "you shall not pass!". He holds up a single finger and sends forth a whirlwind.

hints.author: desmidus
hints.mnemonic: The confrontation between the two sign-language people looked like a whirlwind of fingers.

hints.author: ChrisSimons
hints.mnemonic: Imagine a thumb war. A confrontation of fingers in a whirlwind.

hints.author: akrodha
hints.mnemonic: Tornados can smell fear. So next time one threatens your town, don't run away or hide like everyone else. Confront it! Just give it the finger, tell it to piss off, and watch as it fearfully runs away.

hints.author: uberclimber
