hints.mnemonic: If you publicy speak negatively about someone, you can get sued for slander.

hints.author: crystalcastlecreature
hints.mnemonic: Someone is causing a scene and SAYING in PUBLIC, "IM GONNA SUE YOU!! IM GONNA SUE YOU!!!".

hints.author: decamer0n
hints.mnemonic: This could be seen as a very accurate pictograph of another type of valley

hints.author: radical_tyro
hints.mnemonic: Think of the classic anime 風の 谷のナウシカ (Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind). We see Nausicaa entering the valley mouth gliding on an umbrella.

hints.author: Clint
hints.mnemonic: Yea, though I enter the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for I have brought my umbrella and if anything scares me, I will open my mouth and scream for help!

hints.author: alatown
hints.mnemonic: Pictograph - a little house with mountains behind.

hints.author: meolox
hints.mnemonic: Enter the valley with an umbrella and your mouth closed the mist is quite throat irritating.

hints.author: nakome
hints.mnemonic: This story is quite lascivious, sorry... Now, imagine you are at a 混浴 （こんよく） [two kanjis we now know] Onsen ( 温泉 ), and you are watching a woman bathe. Just picture the water dripping down her cleavage (that valley in between her breasts). Note

hints.author: smithsonian
hints.mnemonic: The mountain man uses the water from the valley to bathe.

hints.author: rtkrtk
hints.mnemonic: Cleavage in Japanese is called the valley of the chest, and bathing sends water drops into that valley. Memorable image, I think you'll agree.

hints.author: axelb
hints.mnemonic: In a valley full of water you may bathe.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Green Giant takes a bath in a valley filled with water.

hints.author: eieneverafter
hints.mnemonic: Imagine a house big enough to contain an entire valley. might want to live there. And now imagine cleaning it. . . . Maybe not . . .

hints.author: adhmm
hints.mnemonic: Biodome.

hints.author: frychiko
hints.mnemonic: To CONTAIN the virus, everyone in the VALLEY had to stay in their HOUSES.

hints.author: konayuki
hints.mnemonic: You're friends with a giant. Being a genteel creature (and a vegetarian -- phew), he invites you for dinner at his house. Not only is it large enough for him, but it contains a whole valley inside. It's quite pretty. Imagine walking in and seeing a beautiful valley contained within the house.

hints.author: RobMow
hints.mnemonic: The sorority house contains valley girls.

hints.author: Matthew
hints.mnemonic: Think of what happens when the snow on top of the mountains melts

hints.author: Ricardo
hints.mnemonic: [melt; dissolve; thaw] An ice cube is melting, loosing the water it contained.

hints.author: AndamanIslander
hints.mnemonic: An inconvenient truth

hints.author: Lucien
hints.mnemonic: Imagine "WARNING

hints.author: crystalcastlecreature
hints.mnemonic: WATER CONTAINED in ice, MELTS.

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: Guess what? Japanese has dirty words too! (In fact, a lot of them) A sexual story is NOT inappropriate here, as this kanji is very sexual, such as in 性欲 ; lust. As for a story

hints.author: mattoc_g
hints.mnemonic: The valley has something my life is lacking.... something I've been longing for.. peace and quiet.

hints.author: konayuki
hints.mnemonic: Imagine a young girl who has lived in this valley her whole life. She's looking out yawning. When confronted about it, she simply replies "This is such a valley of lack! There's nothing to do here but yawn! I'm longing to get out of here. I'm longing for something more than just this valley of lack, this valley of yawns".

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Nausicaa is longing to get back to the valley because she is homesick. She lacks her home.

hints.author: shimouma
hints.mnemonic: When I lived in the valley I spent all my time yawning - now I find myself longing to return.

hints.author: rtkrtk
hints.mnemonic: Again using the fact that cleavage in Japanese is called "valley of the chest"

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Welcome to cloak-valley, the valley where everyone wears cloaks and every shop sells cloaks. Mnemonic

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: Elven cloaks are abundant in the valley of Rivendell.

hints.author: pazustep
hints.mnemonic: She used a cloak to hide her abundant valley from prying eyes.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: [+rtkrtk] It's said that cleavage actually looks like the cleavage of the rear end - in other words, it looks like a bun dent, or abundant. Imagine a magazine called abundant a-bun-dents, and the winter issue features pretty woman wearing nothing but a heavy trench coat, exposing her abundant a-bun-dents, featuring Hidden Valley Ranch seductively poured all over them. Gross, sure, but hey. Whatever works, right? I was having hella trouble with this one.

hints.author: samusam
hints.mnemonic: Picture the molten lead (the heavy metal) being discreetly drained out of the factory into a gully behind.

hints.author: Lizzie
hints.mnemonic: Lead is a very poisonous metal, and should not enter your mouth.

hints.author: nolusu
hints.mnemonic: Lead -> Dental fillings -> Metal that enters the mouth to fill a hole in a tooth.

hints.author: Austin
hints.mnemonic: One term in Chinese for a pussy is the "golden gully". That is exactly the literal meaning of the two parts of this Kanji. To get the keyword out of this Kanji just think of all the GOLDEN GULLY's the boys in Led Zeppelin used to fill in thier hayday. Of all the rock bands in history, LE(A)D zeppelin is famous for how much sex they used to have - read "Hammer of the God's", if you don't believe me.

hints.author: Onikagii
hints.mnemonic: This is an odd story. IF you have ever broken a pencil right in two the long way you can see the pencil lead lying in the little gully formed by the wood. Helps me remember that lead is used in the word 鉛筆 えんぴつ for pencil.

hints.author: Kieron
hints.mnemonic: Water in a gully runs alongside the path.

hints.author: DrWarrior12
hints.mnemonic: Picture one of those idiots that run alongside the bicyclists in the Tour de France trying to give them water. Watch as the cyclist shoves the person into a gully that runs alongside the road.

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: Kurisu wrote

hints.author: Kurisu
hints.mnemonic: Anyone who has been to Japan has seen all the water in the gullies running alongside the roads and rice paddies.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Water runs alongside the gully.

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: You won first PRIZE in a shell-fish eating contest. Unfortunately you spent the whole night in the outhouse after.

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: As a prize for being the 1,000,000th person to use the restaurant's outhouse, I got all the clams I could eat.

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: This is a bit silly.. or maybe not only a bit, but.. You know some foodstuffs (cereals come to mind) sometimes have prizes mixed in them? Well, in this case, the prize was a shell (money, remember) and you only notice in the outhouse... (see also secret (#904 秘)).

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: You win! Your prize is an outhouse filled with shellfish! (Just imagine the disbelief of the contestant...).

hints.author: dinmamma
hints.mnemonic: Winning the Nobel prize gives you ESTEEM ON TOP OF MONEY. (this helps you remember the layout of the kanji too.).

hints.author: calittle
hints.mnemonic: Every major political party, if personified, would look like a giant outhouse walking around with  human legs spewing out a constant stream of bullshit.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Every political party is full of shit. But nobody ever says how they get that way. Well, here's your answer - a political party memer is in the outhouse, greedily chowing down on the contents inside. He's grown so accustomed to the taste that he's in all the way, and all you can see are his legs through the window. He'll come inside later to the auditorium to make a speech and spew everything out.

hints.author: rtkrtk
hints.mnemonic: Here's an easy one from current events. Recently a certain senator, member of a family-values political party, was caught in an outhouse touching the human legs of the guy in the stall next to him - who happened to be a police officer. True story, folks - search for "wide stance senator" for details.

hints.author: ctraabe
hints.mnemonic: Politicians in the (insert party name here) party deliver so much bullcrap, they might as well be outhouses on legs.

hints.author: pacersfan218
hints.mnemonic: Since he refused to become a member of the Chinese Communist Party, he was shoved into the outhouse with only his legs sticking out.

hints.author: pmbeddall
hints.mnemonic: In most communities you will be hauled into city hall if you use the ground as an outhouse.

hints.author: szreter
hints.mnemonic: There is a secret hall buried in the soil underneath the outhouse.

hints.author: nilfisq
hints.mnemonic: The smallest public chamber you can imagine is a public toilet (outhouse)

hints.author: onoki
hints.mnemonic: Used in school's dining hall 食堂 . Story

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: Our town's public hall is really just a large port-a-potty sitting on a big mound of dirt. Imagine going to an election and having to trudge up a mound of dirt, then sit in a cramped, smelly port-a-potty along with several other citizens just to hear this week's minutes.

hints.author: Avispa
hints.mnemonic: It's usual to take your towel with your when you go to the outhouse at the onsen (hot springs bath in Japan) so everybody doesn't see your stuff.

hints.author: Asgard
hints.mnemonic: In the outhouse toilet you'd usually hope to find toilet paper to wipe your ass. If it's already gone, which is usually the case, simply use the towel.

hints.author: Proxx
hints.mnemonic: It's usual to carry along your own towel when you are in Japan, because at the outhouses (public toilets) there are no frickin' towels (or something else) to dry your hands. (usually gaijins use there trousers... ).

hints.author: matt_jenkins
hints.mnemonic: Tnx Adhmm

hints.author: harusame
hints.mnemonic: Showering at your friend's house, you accidently use their good towel. "Don't use my esteemed towel!" he cries. "That's for special guests! Use the usual towel!" At this point, you're offended at not being worthy of his "esteemed towel" and storm out of his house, naked and wet.

hints.author: Austin
hints.mnemonic: Compared to pants, a SKIRT is the GARMENT to be wearing when you want to use one of those Japanese toilets. It makes it so much easier

hints.author: Danieru
hints.mnemonic: Haven't you ever noticed that the men / women signs on the front of outhouses are sometimes very similar? The silhouettes are usually the same, but one will decidedly be wearing a garment in the shape of a SKIRT. Also, we've already learned the kanji for "woman", so if the signs are only in kanji you have no right to wander in and claim ignorance, perv!

hints.author: hunchbag
hints.mnemonic: A skirt is the most convenient outhouse garment!

hints.author: kansaigaijin
hints.mnemonic: Women go to the outhouse by lifting up their skirt and under garments, then laying down a nasty fart laced squirt shit.

hints.author: notgoing2argue
hints.mnemonic: In an outhouse, garments can get ruined easily so you might want to hike up your SKIRT Nancy.

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: If you're going to manipulate your body with your hand, then go do it in an outhouse, at least!

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Instead of magazines, we keep a Rubiks Cube in the outhouse to manipulate with your hands while you do your business.

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: This also means a palm. So you're in the outhouse, manipulating something with your hand(palm).

hints.author: Biene
hints.mnemonic: In islamic countries try to avoid to manipulate food with your left hand after you went to the outhouse. (Since that hand is used to clean oneself with water after going to the toilet, instead of using toilettpaper. It's concidered unclean no matter how much you washed it afterwards. http

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Think of students who manipulate a pen in their hands to pass the time during classes. Here you manipulate something in your hands to pass time while you are in the outhouse. Maybe you're making little balls out of toilet paper, or playing with a Rubik's cube (“Outhouse hands manipulate”).

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: A pelt is hooked on a branch. A small tent is made with a pelt and a branch planted in the ground. The mnemonic hints at the first stroke (the hanging pelt) and the hook at the end of the second stroke. This is chinese radical #107 meaning “skin”.

hints.author: myglagata
hints.mnemonic: To be honest, this is one of those cases where I have found it easier to "just remember it" as a radical, as it occurs so frequently

hints.author: howdycowdy
hints.mnemonic: Davy Crocket used to hang his coon-skin PELT on a branch that had grown out over the edge of a cliff.

hints.author: Harrow
hints.mnemonic: The head from the tiger pelt is hooked over the branch (tiger (#1990 虎) also has this hook on it), and the tiger's tail hangs down on the left. This is Hobbes pretending to be a pelt, which makes the image not so sad. See http

hints.author: Howdoken
hints.mnemonic: The pelt Jason travelled so far for was found hanging from the crooked branch of a tree, standing alone on a cliff.

hints.author: chamcham
hints.mnemonic: Waves are the ocean's pelt (skin).

hints.author: alanj
hints.mnemonic: The Inuit used water-proof seal pelts for their kayaks, to travel the waves.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: If you can see waves appearing in fields of high grass when a strong wind blows, you will easily imagine waves appearing in the fur (pelt) of the water (“waves are water's pelt”).

hints.author: Yozora
hints.mnemonic: Waves blanket the ocean like a WATERY PELT.

hints.author: sethg
hints.mnemonic: Waves are water that is pelting the shore.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: An old woman is seen here as a woman with waves (i.e. wrinkles, creases).

hints.author: walexander5
hints.mnemonic: Picture an old woman on her balcony, watching the waves, wondering if her husband will ever return from the sea.

hints.author: bihzad
hints.mnemonic: You know "The Old Man and the Sea." Well, this is the sequel, "The Old Woman and the Sea Waves.".

hints.author: jotun
hints.mnemonic: The Queen. She's an old woman who waves.

hints.author: liosama
hints.mnemonic: Come one guys.. this one is staring at you right in the face... water + skin + woman. Ok, no matter what you used int he previous frame thsi will help anyway. When your skin is in water for a long time it turns all wavey and old looking. Woman are always sensitive about looking old. wala.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: You expose holes in a pelt by passing your fingers through them and wiggling them on the other side. The sense of the kanji here is to reveal something that was hidden, to make known, to open your heart (thus revealing it, exposing it to others), express your opinion, etc.

hints.author: brian44
hints.mnemonic: Think of it in this vulgar way. You really want her to expose her “beaver” pelt, so you have to encourage her with your fingers to expose it.

hints.author: ihatobu
hints.mnemonic: Fred Flintstone gets arrested for exposing himself to young cave-ladies. He does this by lifting his pelt with his fingers.

hints.author: j0k0m0
hints.mnemonic: Eskimos don't want to expose their fingers from their pelted mitts.

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: Some girls these days wear their clothes so tight that it's like a second skin, a pelt, if you will, and they expose themselves by ripping them off with their fingers, or, at least, I hope.

hints.author: johnskb
hints.mnemonic: Before the invention of scissors or knives, sharp STONES were used to REND PELTs, so that caveman designers could complete new styles for the upcoming year.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Rend is a violent, primitive kind of word. (Image

hints.author: Sunnan
hints.mnemonic: Me Ugg. Me have rock. Me rend pelt with rock.

hints.author: Harrow
hints.mnemonic: Hobbes is stalking with his belly low to the ground when a sharp stone rends his pelt (he is, after all, a stuffed animal).

hints.author: brainrobert1
hints.mnemonic: Rock + pelt = rend. He then took a sharpened STONE to the PELT and rended it from the flesh.. 破る yaburu to tear or rip.

hints.author: gorgon
hints.mnemonic: If you wear a coat of fur (pelt) you are sure to incur the wrath of animal rights extremists.

hints.author: CharleyGarrett
hints.mnemonic: A cloak of fur (pelt) will  incur the wrath of animal lovers.

hints.author: akrodha
hints.mnemonic: A fashionable lady decided to put on her cloak of pelt, and thus incurred the wrath of animal rights extremists. But don't worry, they weren't brutal or violent

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: Also means "cover". Having incurred God's wrath, God made Adam and Eve clothing made from animal skins to cover their private parts.

hints.author: rowdyphantom
hints.mnemonic: Incur someone's rage by replacing his fine cloak with a smelly old pelt.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: The remainder of the bones have been thrown from the float (for the dogs maybe, at the end of the parade).

hints.author: Pauline
hints.mnemonic: Throwing all those coins (see coin (#368 銭)) was a really bad idea; people got mad with greed. The only remainders left were the bones of those that was on the float.

hints.author: cameron_en
hints.mnemonic: After the cannibal float had passed the crowd, all that remained were bones.

hints.author: Howdoken
hints.mnemonic: At the halloween parade, there was a float made entirely from bones. Once the parade was over the remainder of the bones were left in the streets for the dogs to chew on.

hints.author: Perry
hints.mnemonic: Maths problem - it takes 6 bones to make a float. If I have 37 bones and make as many floats as possible, what's the remainder?

hints.author: Johnnyltn
hints.mnemonic: Think of the early Christian martyrs who suffered martyrdom because of their faith. See them held in cells for 10 days (a decameron) before being fed to the lions. They appear before the chanting Roman crowds as bones to be devoured. Think of what was leftover after the lions finished them off....nothing, not even a pile of bones to bury.

hints.author: ruisu
hints.mnemonic: The boney man martyred himself during his 10 day hunger-strike.

hints.author: imojyochu
hints.mnemonic: To commerate the saint's martyrdom his BONES will be displayed for a 10-DAY-PERIOD (decameron).

hints.author: yukkuri_kame
hints.mnemonic: After being bound up for a day (see decameron (#67 旬)) there was nothing left of Heisig but BONES. He had attained MARTYRDOM for the sake of an obscure keyword...

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Nice. If you know about the Canterbury Tales, you know they were pilgrims going to see a martyrs tomb. Just imagine that they're going to see the relics(bones) of that martyr on their decameron!

hints.author: saranich
hints.mnemonic: A t-bone steak is vermilion - particularly if served rare.

hints.author: matticus
hints.mnemonic: Castlevania -- The vermillion skeletons (bones) are particularly hard because they just keep regenerating.

hints.author: Thora
hints.mnemonic: [Too abstract, so

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: The vermilion bone is particularly (especially) different from the others (it's a dog toy made of rubber).

hints.author: howdycowdy
hints.mnemonic: "Not PARTICULARLY," I said when asked if I was interested in buying a vermillion bone.

hints.author: howdycowdy
hints.mnemonic: Advertisement for Breast Implants -- Tired of nights all alone? Want to get boned straightaway? AUGMENT your breasts and all your troubles will be solved!

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: In the movie “Gattaca”, Vincent Freeman (played by Ethan Hawke) augments his size by straightening his bones (his legs), in order to match up with the genetically “perfect” population, and reach his goal of travelling in space. The stretching of his lower leg bones involved multiplying the bone cells, another sense of this key word.

hints.author: jabberwockychortles
hints.mnemonic: He wanted to augment his height so had some bone added to his legs straightaway.

hints.author: elmaestrokgb
hints.mnemonic: Wolverine has had his body specially augmented. He has special super-bones and the ability to heal straightaway after any injury.

hints.author: Raichu
hints.mnemonic: This kanji actually means multiply/reproduce. God said, "Be fruitful and multiply." When Adam saw his partner, he straight away said, "this is bone of my bone" (since she was made from his rib).

hints.author: khooks
hints.mnemonic: A line of skeletal warriors, all armed with sabers.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Skeleton army rank and file. Dudes made of bones carrying sabres.

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: Common scene in (old) computer rpgs. Skeletons with sabers coming at you neatly in a file. (see skeleton (#1288 骨)).

hints.author: AndamanIslander
hints.mnemonic: Really this means things/persons lined up in a row (as opposed to 'columns'). So just picture a row of neatly lined up bones filed next to a row of nicely lined up swords. Must be some sort of Khmer Rouge memorial. Now picture the people lining up outside the museum to file past those rows of bones and swords. Now you remember this kanji is good for both things and people.

hints.author: mothralad
hints.mnemonic: Imagine dead soldiers standing in file to get into afterlife

hints.author: aircawn
hints.mnemonic: They tried issuing the skeleton warriors with proper garments to wear, but they kept getting split by the sharp bones or by their sabres. In the end, it was decided they look scarier naked anyway.

hints.author: darg_sama
hints.mnemonic: Someone takes a sword made of bone to split the garment right down the middle. Very effective.

hints.author: cameron_en
hints.mnemonic: My boner split a hole in my pants like a saber.

hints.author: Angrybeez
hints.mnemonic: We should walk in single file so no one sees I split my undergarments! (Undergarments should help with position).

hints.author: chamcham
hints.mnemonic: Think about what happens when you split your pants....the tear makes a line in your garment.

hints.author: gorgon
hints.mnemonic: The nazis were ardent believers in the master arian race, see them marching everyone else into the oven fires, single file.

hints.author: Megaqwerty
hints.mnemonic: The undead, marching single file, prove how ardent they are be walking across a field of flame. Fun fact, ardent used to mean to burn.

hints.author: synewave
hints.mnemonic: Ardent followers (skeleton army), file (#812 列), would file over hot coals for their master.

hints.author: philiphoward123
hints.mnemonic: My Japanese students have such an ardent desire to speak native English that you will never find any of them confusing file with fire.

hints.author: chamcham
hints.mnemonic: People can get really extreme and ardent in the line of fire.

hints.author: darg_sama
hints.mnemonic: Ok, this is where knowing some Eastern culture comes in handy! In Japanese society, when someone dies they creamate the body and pick out the remaining bones with special chopsticks. In this case, they're out of chopsticks so they decide to use (gasp!) a spoon instead.

hints.author: pacersfan218
hints.mnemonic: Imagine the grim reaper (the bringer of death), carrying a spoon made of human bones instead of a scythe.

hints.author: blackstockc
hints.mnemonic: The Grim Reaper eats bones for breakfast (with a spoon).

hints.author: Biene
hints.mnemonic: Remeber DEATH from Terry Pratchett's Discworld books? Now picture bony DEATH as he sits down (in the book "Mort") in the restaurant together with his new apprentice to eat a bowl of hot curry with a spoon.

hints.author: peepiceek
hints.mnemonic: One evening I choked to death on a spoon. (Don't ask how I wrote this...).

hints.author: darg_sama
hints.mnemonic: I imagine an interment as a funeral. At this funeral it's an open casket, and the dead body (death) is holding flowers with both of its hands.

hints.author: calittle
hints.mnemonic: During the interment ceremony, the grandchildren placed flowers over the dead body while the widow sat praying with two hands.

hints.author: kanjihito
hints.mnemonic: During interment, flowers are placed above death, while two hands from the netherworld are pulling from below.

hints.author: humpolec
hints.mnemonic: We see Death himself standing at a funeral. This time he's not holding his scythe, but he has flowers in both hands.

hints.author: vertigo959
hints.mnemonic: I used to confuse 亡 and 死 in this kanji, so I use the image of 死神 (shinigami, or death god) to help remember the right element.--- At this interment funeral, underneath the flowers on top of the grave, the death god ( 死神 ）, is descending towards the underworld, lowering the coffin with both hands. ソウ 葬式。葬る .

hints.author: SpaceCakeGirl
hints.mnemonic: What a dilemna, you wore SUNGLASSES over your EYES when you went to the BIRDHOUSE so you wouldn't be recognized - but now you can't WINK at the girl you want!

hints.author: Immacolata
hints.mnemonic: Imagine Snoopy winking with his big eyes (and a happy smile) standing next to Woodstocks Birdhouse, woodstock being so cool that he wears little sunglasses.

hints.author: mattimus
hints.mnemonic: At the whorehouse a girl pulled down her sunglasses and winked at me with a single massive eye OMG SHE'S A CYCLOPS. Didn't stop me though.

hints.author: Stormchild
hints.mnemonic: Out of the corner of your eye, you thought some cute girl was winking at you, but it turns out it was just a birdhouse with sunglasses. Isn't that always the way it turns out.

hints.author: mattoc_g
hints.mnemonic: I prefer to use the 舛 to mean "dancing legs". Makes a lot more sense to me that way. Just think of it as in the evening, you want to watch dancing legs, (you can see the two legs wrapped around a pole... right? ;) ) You go to a certain kind of "BIRD" HOUSE, to watch the DANCING LEGS. Your EYE is drawn to one particular set of dancing legs in the birdhouse, she has a twinkle in her eye and you blink as she WINKS at you. (This kanji also means blink and twinkle).

hints.author: brian44
hints.mnemonic: Your ear is like the eye on the side of your head for seeing things, but there is hair around it that creates jagged lines.

hints.author: delbertmon
hints.mnemonic: Just remember it.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Pictograph, see book. * The primitive meaning can easily be extended to ear plugs.

hints.author: andresito
hints.mnemonic: Deaf people use their ears as eyes. An ear is just a modified eye.

hints.author: DavidZ
hints.mnemonic: Correct stroke order

hints.author: Rakushun
hints.mnemonic: You put your ear next to a womans crotch...and somehow, from it, you hear the words "Take me....".

hints.author: cjon256
hints.mnemonic: Fuaburisu's with a twist

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Someone does the classic magic trick of pretending to take something out of their ear (such as a coin). Or maybe it is a cigarette or a pen that you take from behind the ear (the crotch of the ear).

hints.author: skays
hints.mnemonic: You know that episode of Family Guy where Meg was gonna take it in the ear instead of the crotch?

hints.author: Seiska
hints.mnemonic: "Its too dangerous to go alone take these." and so Link takes earplugs and crotch protection and goes to face the furious Zelda. Ganondorf was not the final boss..

hints.author: jwy2k2
hints.mnemonic: The gist of it is this

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Pickpocket advice

hints.author: Dragg
hints.mnemonic: I gotta RUN soon so I will just TAKE the GIST of your otherwise long-winded story.

hints.author: nadiatims
hints.mnemonic: Advice for learning japanese

hints.author: ruuku35
hints.mnemonic: Fagin is telling Oliver Twist

hints.author: Nukemarine
hints.mnemonic: TAKE the UTMOST care when you SUN bath all DAY, or you'll get burned from your EARS to your CROTCH.

hints.author: khooks
hints.mnemonic: Do your utmost - seize(take) the day.

hints.author: mikedough2
hints.mnemonic: The renewable energy that man can take from the sun is of utmost importance to the world's future.

hints.author: theBryan
hints.mnemonic: To take the utmost out of life, you must live fully each day. You must Carpe Diem, Seize or Take the day.

hints.author: Perry
hints.mnemonic: Its of the UTMOST importance this doesn't TAKE all DAY.

hints.author: volfy
hints.mnemonic: Take the utmost care that you don't have your finger in the way when you take a snapshot.

hints.author: astridtops
hints.mnemonic: When I learned photography from my dad as a little girl, he explained the basics to me

hints.author: Hujis
hints.mnemonic: As a Japanese girl, when having your snapshot taken it is of the utmost importance to make the peace sign with your fingers.

hints.author: cangy
hints.mnemonic: Pictograph of a large SLR, finger grip on the side, flash on top, and the bit that takes the snapshot underneath.

hints.author: Francois
hints.mnemonic: When taking a snapshot, 1. Don't put FINGER on lens 2. Don't look into SUN 3. TAKE it!

hints.author: rhclaghorn
hints.mnemonic: Vincent Van Gogh's greatest shame was cutting off his ear to win the heart of a woman.

hints.author: scottamus
hints.mnemonic: Amelia Ear-Heart (sic) brought shame to those who said women couldn't fly.

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: This chinese character explains how shame stands between social expectations (the ear listening to the outside world) and one's own expectations (one's heart).

hints.author: nilfisq
hints.mnemonic: I am ashamed that I don't know who Amelia Ear-heart is...

hints.author: Katsuo
hints.mnemonic: Star Trek crew gossiping about Mr. Spock

hints.author: mothralad
hints.mnemonic: Worst post in history

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Buckingham Palace guards are famous for staying at their post no matter what, even if you blow a kazoo in their ear!

hints.author: raulir
hints.mnemonic: You want to leave your post when you hear the sound of the fiesta.

hints.author: Stormchild
hints.mnemonic: A guard stands at his post, listening for approaching intruders. If he hears anyone coming, he must sound out the warning signal -- which is (due to budget cuts) just a kazoo.

hints.author: spoonsman
hints.mnemonic: From Star Wars

hints.author: tcjeff
hints.mnemonic: A holy man hears with his ears before he speaks with his mouth, which places him higher than a king in people's esteem.

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: The trick for me is to remember that the 耳 is to the left of the 口 . However, this is easy because a true holy man uses his ear to listen (i.e., to God or his supplicant) before he opens his mouth to speak, unlike a charlatan who just makes something up. Of course, kings are often true holy men and prophets (e.g., King David in the bible).

hints.author: lb4269
hints.mnemonic: Holy Hand Grenade

hints.author: Stormchild
hints.mnemonic: Since God will only speak to the people through the king (or so he says, anyway), his ears and mouth are therefore holy.

hints.author: jimsublimeman
hints.mnemonic: Holy men always seem to have their mouths in the ears of kings and other important leaders. Think Rasputin...

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: Only a truly daring Japanese student would wear a spike in his ear under the gaze of the Japanese teacher taskmasters!

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: See that ear nailed over there ? It's the ear of the last person who was too daring with the taskmistress.

hints.author: strugglebunny
hints.mnemonic: English (punk) teenagers in the 70s were daring when they pierced nails through their ears. Many of them got in a lot of trouble with their taskmasters (parents, teachers, etc.).

hints.author: plumage
hints.mnemonic: The daring schoolgirl whispers, "Come NAIL me," in the EAR of the TASKMASTER...

hints.author: ruuku35
hints.mnemonic: You must be DARING to use a SPIKE to tickle the top of the EAR of the TASKMASTER, very DARING indeed!

hints.author: dukelexon
hints.mnemonic: I promise to use my ear to do nothing but listen ... stick a needle in my eye, cross my heart and hope to die! (Intentionally said backwards to get the order of the primitives correct).

hints.author: Johnnyltn
hints.mnemonic: Listening to others is different from hearing [1626] with the ear. One must allow the words to pierce through the eyes (the window of the soul) and reach deep into the heart...a symbol of thinking about and contemplating on what was said, not just the sounds of words spoken. A married man while reading his newspaper, his wife going on about something suddenly, says, "You're not listening to me, are you?" He replies, "I heard every word you said. You said..." “Yes, but you're not listening.".

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: A doctor is listening as best as he can to someone's heart, but even with the stethoscope the doctor can not hear anything, because the patient's heart is "so small it could pass through the eye of a needle" (see frame 400). Contrast with passive "hear" of frame 1626.

hints.author: jwy2k2
hints.mnemonic: When you really listen to another person and not just hear them, you use your ears like ten eyes and see their heartfelt meaning.

hints.author: vertigo959
hints.mnemonic: To detect lies, Darth Vader turns up his ear piece loud enough so that he can hear someone's heart beat, and closely listens. チョウ 聴覚、聴講、聴診器。 .

hints.author: PepeSeco
hints.mnemonic: (re

hints.author: decamer0n
hints.mnemonic: She had me in her pocket. It was a state of mind that would eventually demolish me... ---I use this story with a kind of unrequited love theme not only because it jives with my romantic soul, but also because this kanji also has connotations of attachment and sentiments/feelings.

hints.author: Spidercat
hints.mnemonic: Data is a good security officer because his piercing eyes can even scan garments for hidden pockets.

hints.author: Istvan
hints.mnemonic: Imagine Darth Vader's state of mind when he discovers his garment has not pockets. " D O NOT WANT!".

hints.author: jameserb
hints.mnemonic: The tailor's state of mind when he eyed the needle and the simple garment

hints.author: Codexus
hints.mnemonic: I'll focus on the mandala primitive here. I guess Heisig chose this keyword for phonetic reasons and as a character it's the "man" in mandara/mandala ( 曼荼羅 ). A mandala is a graphic representation of the universe, here split in 3 planes of existance, the sun representing the cosmos, the eye represents the human observer, the crotch represents the animal instincts.

hints.author: ruisu
hints.mnemonic: He' s often ridiculed for having his eye on crotches all day.

hints.mnemonic: I always refer to the power of the KATAKANA "KA".

hints.author: stshores24
hints.mnemonic: I have a very powerful muscle カ in my driveway!

hints.author: Viking101
hints.mnemonic: As a primitive, I chose Arnold Schwarzenegger. Picture him saying California with his powerful accent (KA-lee-fornia).

hints.author: oyxoyx
hints.mnemonic: The power of Goku

hints.author: DrWarrior12
hints.mnemonic: You've got to have a lot of power to wield a sword with such a small blade (notice how the handle of the sword is about 5 times the size of the little blade on top?).

hints.author: fuaburisu
hints.mnemonic: Male is seen here as muscles working in the field, in other words working in the rice fields is the work of the male who are usually stronger. This is more or less the meaning of the original Chinese character.

hints.author: Callooh
hints.mnemonic: When it comes to choosing a MAN, I prefer brains over muscles.

hints.author: phauna
hints.mnemonic: Men have brains and muscles. And, er, women don't.

hints.author: sethg
hints.mnemonic: A man should value his brains over his muscles.

hints.author: andresito
hints.mnemonic: Male have more power to work the rice field.

hints.author: partyrash
hints.mnemonic: Those jocks who always tried to show their muscles in the schoolhouse are now the ones out there doing manual labor jobs while we sit here and learn Japanese. Ha!

hints.author: smithsonian
hints.mnemonic: At the schoolhouse, the administration develops the children's muscles by making them do manual labour.

hints.author: cjon256
hints.mnemonic: Hard labor is like a schoolhouse for your muscles.

hints.author: akahige
hints.mnemonic: The labor laws in Japan are different from America. At public schools you'll see kids cleaning--they're the labor force.

hints.author: j0k0m0
hints.mnemonic: Stay in school, kids, if you want the power to avoid a life of hard labor.

hints.author: smithsonian
hints.mnemonic: The necromancer hangs out at the local graveyard and uses his dark powers to recruit an army of undead. Emphasize the verb form to keep distinct from the noun cadet (#1173 曹).

hints.author: henroski
hints.mnemonic: WANTED

hints.author: partyrash
hints.mnemonic: The army starts heavily recruiting a lot of manpower and muscle to replace the many who have been killed and sent to the graveyard.

hints.author: nagisa
hints.mnemonic: The best place for the zombie army to recruit is the graveyard, where their power in numbers can easily be doubled.

hints.author: j0k0m0
hints.mnemonic: The graveyard does have the power to recruit us all.

hints.author: dihutenosa
hints.mnemonic: I have an inferiority complex because I have fewer muscles than everyone else at the gym. They all look like Macho Man Randy Savage (power) to me.

hints.author: mspertus
hints.mnemonic: I had trouble remembering the relative position of the components, so now I use this story

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: I have an inferiority complex because I have few muscles! (Image

hints.author: sgrant
hints.mnemonic: If you like 'Heroes', then imagine Sylar having an inferiority complex, because he has a few powers less than Peter Petrelli.

hints.author: cingold
hints.mnemonic: Inferiority is felt by those with few muscles.

hints.author: dingomick
hints.mnemonic: The great achievements of humankind, were crafts completed by muscle power

hints.author: stehr
hints.mnemonic: All of Arnold Schwarzenegger's achievements started with him crafting his muscles.

hints.author: Virtua_Leaf
hints.mnemonic: Try adding the phrase

hints.author: plumage
hints.mnemonic: In WarCRAFT, ACHIEVEMENTS were added so POWERful players would have something else to do.

hints.author: PepeSeco
hints.mnemonic: The greatest achievement is to bent an I-beam with your own power and muscles.

hints.author: synewave

hints.author: tcjeff
hints.mnemonic: A little girl is trying to persuade a little boy to play dolls with her. She offers him her plastic pegasus figure and says, "See? Pegasus has muscles. He's got Pegasus power." And the little boy says "You cannot persuade me to play with your flying unicorn. I'm not of that persuasion.".

hints.author: Wosret
hints.mnemonic: Only the powerful can persuade Pegasus to let them ride her.

hints.author: astgtciv

hints.author: cjon256
hints.mnemonic: Guy + Power

hints.author: chamcham
hints.mnemonic: Attempted rape......a man attemps to use his power to force his crotch into a woman....try to imagine her actually struggling as much as possible (toiling) and putting up a good fight.....also instead of intercourse, you can imagine him trying to force her to give him a blowjob(the crotch next to the woman).

hints.author: calittle
hints.mnemonic: Guys with large muscles usually find themselves toiling in dirty, disgusting trenches doing the work more delicately constructed individuals cannot (or will not).

hints.author: tryllid
hints.mnemonic: Guy + Power

hints.author: Shingo
hints.mnemonic: For the average guy to get muscles he must really toil in the gym.

hints.author: mantixen
